name: Sabotage by Midnight
description:
WASD to move.

Mouse to aim.

Click to shoot.

Play button below game for music.

Made in 2 hours and 56 minutes for Tri-Jam.

Made in vanilla CSS, HTML and JS.

Try to complete the levels and destroy the weapons at the end before the timer runs out.

The game restarts after a win or loss.

If input doesn't work click the game.
